* `C` - control. So `C-a` means to hit the control key and the a key.
* `M` - alt/meta



## terminal 

* `C-p` = previous command
* `C-u`= erase line before cursor
* `C-l` = refresh screen
* `C-M-t` = new terminal window

## Vim
